header.languageNote: Content and interface will adapt to selected language

hero.title: From Vision to Reality
hero.description: Orouba for Food industry Co. was founded in 1998, with a vision to produce premium quality frozen food products. Our 20,000 square meter factory, equipped with state of the art technology and operated by our skilled engineers, ensures top quality production.  Committed to consumer satisfaction, we offer a diverse range of frozen vegetables, fruits, beans, and pre-fried products, made with simple, all natural ingredients.

why-us.title: Why Orouba ?
why-us.subtitle: Discover the Difference in Every Bite:
why-us.description: Choosing Orouba means opting for quality, convenience, and a touch of culinary delight. Our all-natural, delicious products cater to diverse tastes, making meal prep easy and fun. Trust Orouba to turn ordinary meals into extraordinary experiences and bring joy to your kitchen. Join us and discover the delight of cooking with Orouba!

standards.title: Our Standards
standards.subtitle: We are committed to the highest standards of quality to ensure that every product we offer meets your needs and exceeds your expectations.
standards.noPreservatives: All products are free from any preservatives or chemical substances
standards.selection: All products undergo a selection analysis process to choose the best and high-quality fresh produce only
standards.freezing: Quick freezing through IQF tunnels. Deep-freeze compartment or freezer at (-18 C) 0 F.

ourMap.title: Orouba World Map
ourMap.description: Our extensive network guarantees timely delivery to over 50 countries worldwide. Our journey began in Egypt, and now, we are present in the Middle East, Europe, Japan, USA & Australia.

certifications.title: Orouba Certifications

description.part1: At Orouba, we take pride in our commitment to quality and excellence, which is reflected in the certifications and standards we have achieved. We have obtained a range of certifications that attest to the high standards of our products and processes.
description.part2: Each of these certifications signifies our adherence to stringent quality control measures, environmental sustainability practices, occupational health and safety standards, and compliance with international food safety regulations.

certifications.iso45001: ISO 45001 - Occupational Health and Safety Management Systems

values.title: Our Values
values.description: At Orouba, our values serve as the foundation of everything we do. They guide our decisions, actions, and interactions with our stakeholders, and reflect our commitment to integrity, excellence, and social responsibility.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct our business with the highest standards of honesty, ethics, and transparency. Integrity is the cornerstone of our relationships with customers, partners, and employees.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in all aspects of our operations, from product quality to customer service. We continuously seek opportunities for improvement and innovation to exceed expectations and deliver exceptional value to our stakeholders.

socialResponsibility.title: Social Responsibility
socialResponsibility.description: We are dedicated to making a positive impact on society and the environment. We prioritize sustainability, community engagement, and ethical practices, ensuring that our business contributes to the well-being of people and the planet.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of collaboration and teamwork. By fostering an inclusive and supportive work environment, we harness the collective talents and strengths of our diverse workforce to achieve our goals and drive success.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. We listen to their needs, anticipate their preferences, and strive to exceed their expectations with innovative solutions and outstanding service.

ProductTypes.title: Product Types
ProductTypes.description: We take pride in manufacturing and supplying nutritious, healthy products every day. All our products contain no additives as we depend only on natural ingredients. We have different product lines and large portfolio of brands & types
ProductTypes.frozenFruitsDescription: Fresh fruits are selected and processed, then subjected to quick freezing to keep their nutrition values and attributes
ProductTypes.preFriedDescription: We have our famous Falafel types, in addition to our original recipes of pre-fried potatoes with different ingredients and pre-fried cauliflower florets
ProductTypes.frozenVegetablesDescription: All our vegetables are carefully selected. They undergo inspection and selection process, then the vegetables are washed, processed and subjected to quick freezing, We have a large variety of types to serve different needs
ProductTypes.frozenBeansDescription: Our beans & grains are selected, soaked or boiled to save time and effort, Many of which are ready to eat and some take around 10 minutes of heating

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.paragraph1: At Orouba, we're all about turning everyday meals into delightful experiences. Since 1998, we've been a beloved staple in Egyptian kitchens, cherished for our premium-quality, nutritious, and all-natural frozen food products. Our passion for food and commitment to quality inspires creativity in kitchens everywhere, bringing people together and spreading happiness with every delicious bite. Join us in making every meal a special memory.

ourPurpose.title: Our Purpose
ourPurpose.paragraph1: We believe food brings people together. That's why we offer a wide range of delicious frozen products, from fresh veggies, fruits, and beans to flavorful falafel and appetizers. We're always innovating to offer exciting new choices made with simple, all-natural ingredients. We make in-the-kitchen experiences easy, quick and fun for everyone. Our aim is to inspire joyful mealtimes and help you share the magic of food with your loved ones.

ourFactory.title: Our Factory
ourFactory.description: Constructed over an area of 20,000 square meters in the first industrial zone - El-Obour industrial city the factory consists of the following facilities:

buildingA.title: Building A
buildingA.description: Administrative building comprising three floors to host all the factory departments.

buildingB.title: Building B
buildingB.description: Factory building comprising two floors. The ground floor for raw materials receiving and preparation, group of belts and lift pumps uplifts the raw materials to the following floor for processing.

area.title: Area
area.description: Our factory is constructed over 20,000 square meters.

employees.title: Employees
employees.description: Over 700 dedicated employees who contribute to our company's success

capacity.title: Capacity
capacity.description: Our capacity for individual quick freezing (IQF) frozen vegetables reaches 25,000 Tons per year.

preFried.title: Capacity for pre-fried products
preFried.description: Our capacity for pre-fried products amounts to 1,800 tons per year.

coldStore.title: Overall cold store capacity
coldStore.description: Our cold storage capacity totals 10,000 tons per year, 5000 m².

productionSteps.title: Production Steps

step1.title: Receiving, inspection and selection process
step1.description: We carefully select the fresh vegetables, and make sure they are ripe to be tender and have a delicious taste. Different selection processes are applied due to the difference in products nature.

step2.title: Sorting and washing
step2.description: Vegetables undergo thorough sorting to ensure defect free products. They are then subjected to washing process to get the clean products we serve.

step3.title: Blanching
step3.description: Blanching time depends on the type of vegetables.

step4.title: Cooling
step4.description: This prepares for IQF process. It is done immediately after blanching.

step5.title: Freezing
step5.description: The IQF process ensures maintaining the products attributes and nutrients.

step6.title: Packing
step6.description: The products under go several packing processes.

productionSteps.specializedProcessing: Some steps are done for specific types only, like :Size separation by grades for okra. Chopping & sifting, for tomatoes. Cutting for some products. Grating and crushing some products like onion and garlic.

export.title: We Export To All Over The World
export.description: Orouba reaches across the globe, delivering quality products worldwide. Our extensive network ensures timely delivery to over 50 countries around the world. Our journey began in Egypt, and now, we are present in the middle East, Europe, Japan, USA, Canada & Australia.
